page.title: The Meeting House - Welcome
page.keywords: Church, Toronto, Anabaptist, Theatre, Jesus, Homechurch, Bruxy, Be In Christ, Ontario

image1.alt: Community of friends hanging out together and asking questions around a table.
Big group of friends hanging out together at Home Church.
Group of friends talking about spirituality and Jesus.
Friends sitting down and talking about Jesus and spirituality.
Friends sitting down and talking about Jesus and spirituality.
Friends sitting down and talking about Jesus and spirituality.

content.text1: When’s the last time someone asked you what you believe? We’re a church that loves Jesus and loves people. We don't have all the answers, but helping you explore is pretty much our favourite thing.
Community is a party and we want to make sure everyone’s invited. Ready to connect with people who want to care for their neighbourhoods?

image1.alt: Group of friends from church sitting together and talking.

content.text1: We're our best selves when we don’t make it all about ourselves. We're beginning the next chapter of our story to go and engage people who have never meaningfully encountered the gospel—and we've got a plan.

image1.alt: Group of friends hanging out at The Meeting House church talking about our Go campaign.

content.text1: Explore the life and teaching of Jesus as well as practical applications for your daily life.

list.title: Sunday Teaching
list.text: The video from our live Sunday services, including notes, reflection questions, and additional content. See what you missed last week, or search through topics in our teaching archive.
list.imageAlt: Young woman sitting at a table and looking at her notes from Sunday teaching at The Meeting House.

list.title: Podcasts
list.text: Our Sunday morning teaching, all in one place. Check out the After Party podcast where we chat with special guests about theology and culture and the Roundtable podcast where we discuss church life with our own leaders and staff team.
list.imageAlt: Team of pastors from The Meeting House sitting around a table and recording a podcast.

list.title: Videos
list.text: Our video library featuring stories of people and communities who show us what it looks like to live the Jesus-centered life.
list.imageAlt: Production volunteer recording a Meeting House video.

list.title: Kids & Youth Curriculum
list.text: Through Sunday morning teaching, midweek resources, and The Parent Blog, the kids and youth curriculum is designed to partner parents and leaders with the resources to disciple their kids and youth well.
list.imageAlt: Kids gathering around a smartphone to watch a video from The Meeting House Kids and Youth curriculum.

content.text1: Part of being a disciple of Jesus is actually taking action and making a difference in this world. We do this through compassion initiatives where we love our neighbours both close and far away, volunteering and giving financially to support the work of our church and other kingdom projects.
Volunteering, giving, and compassion around the block or around the world. We want to use our money, time, and resources to love and serve people on the margins. Are you looking to get involved?

image1.alt: Friends walking together across the street talking about volunteering, compassion, and giving at The Meeting House.
A map representing locations of The Meeting House churches.

content.text1: It’s pretty simple: we get together each week to hang out, build relationships, and find ways to love and serve our local communities as we learn to follow Jesus.
content.text2: What are you doing this Sunday?
